title: Oscars 2017: Chrissy Teigen And John Legend Are Once Again The Cutest Couple On The Red Carpet
text:
Advertisement Oscars 2017: Chrissy Teigen And John Legend Are Once Again The Cutest Couple On The Red Carpet The sheer panelling on Teigen's gown üëå 27/02/2017 00:18 Ellen Wallwork Senior Life Editor at   
They managed to surpass their appearance at the 2016 Academy Awards with an even more endearing display of affection and on point style . Frazer Harrison via Getty Images Frazer Harrison via Getty Images Frazer Harrison via Getty Images VALERIE MACON via Getty Images 
Last year Teigen, who was then pregnant with her and Legend‚Äôs first child Luna, had to be sewn into her Marchesa gown, and on Sunday 26 February, she revealed her Zuhair Murad gown was equally form-fitting. 
‚ÄúIt‚Äôs really tight...I don‚Äôt know what else to say, really,‚Äù she told WWD . Frazer Harrison via Getty Images 
Teigen‚Äôs gown also featured embellished sheer panelling at the front and her favourite design detail - the thigh-high split. Frazer Harrison via Getty Images Frazer Harrison via Getty Images VALERIE MACON via Getty Images SEE ALSO
